q: GM North America President Mark Reuss and Chrysler's Sergio Marchionne all promise not to fall back into the trap of making too many cars and then slapping huge discounts on the vehicles to move metal off dealer lots. This has been the heart of the problem in Detroit, said Sergio Marchionne , who also heads up Fiat, the Italian auto company. Alan Mulally said Ford has learned that it has to`` deal with the current reality. You have to match production to real demand

Keir Starmer , Director of Public Prosecutions, said the Crown Prosecution Service( CPS) would conduct a`` comprehensive assessment'' of evidence collected by detectives. The purpose of this assessment is to ascertain whether there is any material which could now form evidence in any future criminal prosecution relating to phone hacking, the CPS said in a statement.
